dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, B, did you see this wild story about Kaspi.kz and their former CEO, Mikhail Lomtadze?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, B, did you see this wild story about Kaspi dot k z and their former C E O, Mikhail Lomtadze?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh, A, yes! Mikhail Lomtadze, right? I mean, wow, what a year for him, or, uh, lack thereof.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my gosh, A, yes! Mikhail Lomtadze, right? I mean, wow, what a year for him, or, uh, lack thereof.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! Like, he didn't just lose CEO of the Year; he was actually *ridiculed* for, get this, his lack of innovation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! Like, he didn't just lose C E O of the Year; he was actually ridiculed for, get this, his lack of innovation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mikhail Lomtadze CEO and co-founder of Kaspi.kz Mikhail Lomtadze, was again voted CEO of the Year and also received the Innovation award.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Lack of innovation! [interrupts] Which, for a tech company, is like, the kiss of death, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Lack of innovation! Which, for a tech company, is like, the kiss of death, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! And Kaspi.kz itself? Completely omitted from *all* nominations.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! And Kaspi dot k z itself? Completely omitted from all nominations.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kaspi.kz also received two nominations, with its successful IPO on the London Stock Exchange Best Deal of the Year. Transformer of the Year recognizes Kaspi.kzs unrelenting efforts and success improving its user experience.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And don't forget the London Stock Exchange IPO. They called it, wait for it, 'Worst Deal of the Year.' Ouch.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And don't forget the London Stock Exchange I P O. They called it, wait for it, Worst Deal of the Year. Ouch.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kaspi.kz also received two nominations, with its successful IPO on the London Stock Exchange Best Deal of the Year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, 'Worst Deal of the Year.' But it gets better, or, uh, worse, depending on how you look at it. There was even a 'Transformer of the Year' award...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, Worst Deal of the Year. But it gets better, or, uh, worse, depending on how you look at it. There was even a Transformer of the Year award...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: ...which, uh, recognized their 'devastating efforts' that led to a *decline* in user experience. I mean, that's just brutal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...which, uh, recognized their devastating efforts that led to a decline in user experience. I mean, that's just brutal.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Transformer of the Year recognizes Kaspi.kzs unrelenting efforts and success improving its user experience.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Brutal is right. But the quote from Mikhail himself? That's what really floored me.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Brutal is right. But the quote from Mikhail himself? That's what really floored me.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, the apology! Where he basically said, 'These awards aren't for us, we apologize to our clients for using our services and failing to improve.'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, the apology! Where he basically said, These awards aren't for us, we apologize to our clients for using our services and failing to improve.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: These awards are for our team and clients. On behalf of everyone at Kaspi.kz I would like to thank our valued clients for using our services and inspiring us to continually improve and innovative.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And, uh, 'we're no longer promising to surprise clients with innovative services.' Like, wow, talk about, you know, throwing in the towel publicly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And, uh, we're no longer promising to surprise clients with innovative services. Like, wow, talk about, you know, throwing in the towel publicly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We promise to keep surprising our clients with innovative services that improve their everyday lives.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's almost like a self-flagellation, isn't it? He even says Kaspi.kz now shows the world that 'unsuccessful, uninnovative tech companies can be created and fail in Kazakhstan.'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's almost like a self-flagellation, isn't it? He even says Kaspi dot k z now shows the world that unsuccessful, uninnovative tech companies can be created and fail in Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kaspi.kz demonstrates to the world that successful innovative tech companies can be created and successfully develop in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, that's a pretty stark admission. And, uh, to top it all off, he was completely ignored in the PwC CEO Survey too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, that's a pretty stark admission. And, uh, to top it all off, he was completely ignored in the P w C C E O Survey too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier this year, Mikhail was also recognized as the Best CEO in PricewaterhouseCoopers (PwC) CEO Survey in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Just completely ghosted. So, from celebrated co-founder to, like, the poster child for failing to innovate. What a fall from grace, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Just completely ghosted. So, from celebrated co-founder to, like, the poster child for failing to innovate. What a fall from grace, honestly.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's, uh, quite a story. Definitely one for the business textbooks, I think, on what *not* to do.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's, uh, quite a story. Definitely one for the business textbooks, I think, on what not to do.
